name: Busiswa
description:
'''Busiswa Gqulu''' (born 8 November 1988), known mononymously  as '''Busiswa''', is a [[South African people|South African]] singer-songwriter and poet. Born in [[Mthatha]], Eastern Cape, South Africa, she gained public recognition for her feature on [[DJ Zinhle]]'s song, "My Name Is", after being discovered by [[Kalawa Jazmee Records|Kalawa Jazmee's]] CEO [[Oskido]].

After a successful collaboration with DJ Zinhle, she released hits singles  includes; "Ngoku", "Lahla", and was featured on Bhizer's hit, "Gobisiqolo". On 8 December 2017, she released her debut album, ''[[Highly Flavoured]]'', preceded by single, "Bazoyenza". Throughout her career, Gqulu has received numerous accolades. In 2014, she was named in the [[Mail & Guardian 200 Young South Africans|''Mail & Guardian'' 200 Young South Africans]].
